channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t Tax Innovation: The Patent ‘Wealth Tax’ Is a Terrible Idea
item.description: The administration’s proposed fee based on patent value is not only bad policy; it is unconstitutional.

item.title: Women Are Not Defective Men, No Matter What Feminists Tell You
item.description: Leah Libresco Sargeant’s new book, The Dignity of Dependence , makes a powerful case for celebrating the unique qualities that make women special.

item.title: Status Quo or Revolution?
item.description: The peculiar fiscal footprint of the Trump administration.

item.title: Here’s What John Wayne Didn’t Teach You About The Great American Gunfighter
item.description: In Bryan Burrough's latest book, The Gunfighters , he sets the record straight on vigilante violence in the Old West.

item.title: Trump threatens to cut off federal funds for NYC if Mamdani becomes mayor
item.description: President Trump on Monday threatened to withhold federal funds from New York City if democratic socialist candidate Zohran Mamdani wins the city's upc...

item.title: The Lesson of Charlie Kirk’s Life
item.description: He may not have been Mother Teresa or Saint Paul, but he was a blessing to his family and to the world.

item.title: Georgia's 2026 candidates still can't escape fallout from Trump's false 2020 election claims
item.description: Fallout from the 2020 presidential election feels like it may never end in Georgia.

item.title: My 3rd Grade Lawsuit Proves You’re Never Too Young To Stand Up For Religious Liberty
item.description: Isaiah 7:9 says, 'If you do not stand firm in your faith, you will not stand at all.'

item.title: A look at previous government shutdowns and how they ended
item.description: Party leaders in Congress have long criticized government shutdowns as toxic and destructive.

item.title: Leftists Feign Sympathy For Autistic Babies They’d Happily Abort
item.description: True compassion is equipping women to build strong, healthy pregnancies so fewer problems ever arise — not telling them to end the life of their child...

item.title: Wisconsin Move Exposes Planned Parenthood Lies
item.description: It shows government money has long supported abortion procedures there.

item.title: Trump’s Tylenol Cautions Are Just Common Sense
item.description: If Tylenol kills significantly more people yearly than black forest ham, is it responsible for doctors to encourage pregnant moms to take it?

item.title: South Korea says $350B cash payment for trade deal is not possible
item.description: The U.S. and South Korea are struggling to finalize a deal in which Seoul invests in American projects in exchange for a lower tariff rate from Presid...

item.title: Ruwa Romman, with a history of Palestinian advocacy, enters the Georgia governor's race
item.description: A Georgia state House member who advocated for Palestinians at the 2024 Democratic National Convention is entering the state's race for governor.

item.title: Reject the Self-Loathing: A Case for Grateful Patriotism
item.description: Let’s roll up our sleeves and get to the work of renewing this country and passing the blessings of liberty on to the next generation.
